file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-23-05-05 - TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER INSTALLED 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an operational check of the toilet gasper-hose filter. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH TOI- TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER - OPERA- LET GASPER-HOSE 21-23-05-700-801-A TIONAL CHECK FILTER INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-23-05 Page 1 of 4 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-05-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER INSTALLED 2. TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER - OPERATIONAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to do an operational check on the toilet gasper-hose filter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE AMM TASK 21-23-05-000-801-A/400 TOILET GASPER-HOSE FILTER - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the toilet I. Preparation (Figure 501) SUBTASK 840-002-A (1) Energize the aircraft with the external DC-power supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) On the overhead panel, set the GASPER pushbutton to ON. NOTE: Make sure that the GASPER FAN circuit breaker is closed (Location tip: AIR / COND / PNEU / GASPER FAN). J. Operationally Check Toilet Gasper-Hose Filter (if installed) (Figure 501) SUBTASK 710-003-A CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT THERE ARE NO FOREIGN MATERIALS IN THE GASPER OUTLET. IT CAN CAUSE MALFUNCTION TO THE TEST. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 21-23-05 Page 2 of 4 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) In the toilet, turn the gasper outlet fully counterclockwise three times, and make sure that there is an airflow. Refer to Figure 501 DET. B. (2) If there is no airflow at the gasper outlet, remove and discard the toilet gasper-hose filter. Refer to (AMM TASK 21-23-05-000-801-A/400). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 840-003-A (1) On the overhead panel, set the GASPER pushbutton to OFF. (2) De-energize the aircraft. Refer to ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 21-23-05 Page 3 of 4 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
